word: G85 - ἀδημονέω - adēmonéō - ad-ay-mon-eh'-o - Be full of heaviness

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Be full of heaviness
uncomfortable, as not at home, to be troubled, distressed
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a derivative of ἀδέω adeō (to be sated to loathing); to be in distress (of mind): - be full of heaviness, be very heavy.
